QuestData.Title: Insurrection: Breaking the Nighthold
QuestData.Description: First Arcanist Thalyssra sends word that her forces are ready. It is time for you to lead the attack against the Nighthold.$b$bReport to Shal'Aran in Suramar for details.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with First Arcanist Thalyssra in Shal'Aran.
